        <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

 if(!gs.nil(current.rate_type) && !current.rate_type.active) {
  current.setValue('state', 'Submitted');
  current.setAbortAction(true);
  if ( !gs.nil(current.task) ) 
   gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage('Time card for {0} cannot be approved because it has an inactive rate type {1}', [current.getDisplayValue('task'), current.getDisplayValue('rate_type')]));
  else
   gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage('Time card cannot be approved because it has an inactive rate type {0}', [current.getDisplayValue('rate_type')]));
  return;
 }
 var approvedOn = new GlideDateTime();  
 current.setValue("approved_on", approvedOn.getValue());
 
 var service = new TimeCardApprovalService(current);
 if (service.shouldAutoApprove())
  return;
 
 var approver = gs.getUserID();
 var approverList = current.getValue('approver_list');
 
 var currentApprovedBy = [];
 if (!current.approved_by.nil())
  currentApprovedBy = current.getValue('approved_by').split(",");
 
 if(currentApprovedBy.indexOf(approver) < 0)
  currentApprovedBy.push(approver);
 if(JSUtil.notNil(approverList)){
  //get delegator user also
  var g = new GlideRecord("sys_user_delegate");
  g.addQuery("delegate", approver);
  g.addQuery("user", "IN", approverList);
  g.addQuery("approvals", true);
  g.addQuery("starts", "<=", gs.daysAgo(0));
  g.addQuery("ends", ">=", gs.daysAgo(0));
  g.query();
  while( g.next()){
   if(currentApprovedBy.indexOf(g.user) < 0){
    currentApprovedBy.push(g.user);
    //adding work note to the time card
    current.notes = gs.getMessage("Approving the time card on behalf of {0}", [g.getDisplayValue("user")]);
   }
  }
 }
 current.setValue("approved_by", currentApprovedBy.join(","));
 
 if (!gs.hasRole('timecard_admin')) {
  var approvers = (current.getValue('approver_list') && current.getValue('approver_list').split(',')) || [];
  var approvals = (current.getValue('approved_by') && current.getValue('approved_by').split(',')) || [];
    
  var allApproversApproved = true;
  approvers.forEach(function(approver) {
   if (approvals.indexOf(approver) < 0)
    allApproversApproved = false;
  });

  if (!allApproversApproved){
   current.setValue("approved_on", '');
   current.setValue('state', 'Submitted');
  }
 }


})(current, previous);]]></script>
